Name: HÜDDAM
About the game: HÜDDAM It is an open world game that reflects Turkish culture. It has a structure where you can engage in the act of researching and solving events. This game, which is in the horror genre, will lead you to tension, fear and adventure while offering atmospheric environments. You are a religious man, you are helpful. So do you have the courage to solve things? ENViRONMENT Fantastic Places Mysterious Exciting Moments, You Will Travel To Different Worlds. You will pass through the dark realms and reach the center of hell. SUBJECT Ahmet Hodja, who has mastered the science of Havaş As Hüddam, he clarified numerous cases A girl named Zehra who is sick During the henna night, she gets disturbed and closes herself in her room Her family tells this situation to Ahmet Hoca Hodja comes to the village and stays in the middle of a village abandoned by people what the real hodja witnessed is more frightening than anything. WARNİNG The game contains blood and violence in hell scenes. More horror theme is being handled. Sound And Image Can Be Disturbing, May Cause Sudden Visual Panic Attacks. NOTE: There is no anti-religious-blasphemy-sexuality-humiliation-and malicious intent in the game The game is developed by one person.
